name: Ultimate Robot Fight Game 2018
description:
It's a time of war, are you ready for surprise attacks, intricate tactical maneuvers and the many sneaky tricks your rivals have in store for you? Destroy enemy robots, capture all the beacons, and upgrade your weapons to increase combat strength, speed, and durability of your battle robot. Prove yourself in each map and use different strategies and tactics to emerge victorious from battle!


Ultimate Robot Fight Game 2018 Features:
- Multiple shooting guns
- Futuristic and sci-fi 3D environment
- Smooth shooting controls
- Offline gameplay
- Realistic physics controls
- HD Graphics and 3D environment
- Highly optimized 3D models and graphics
- Amusing sounds
- Challenging and highly addictive missions
